definition: a writ issued by court authority to compel the attendance of a witness at a judicial proceeding, serve or summon with a subpoena
details:
noun
- a writ issued by court authority to compel the attendance of a witness at a judicial proceeding
= synonyms: subpoena ad testificandum
verb
- serve or summon with a subpoena
= example: serve or summon with a subpoena
